publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1954 Rosie Kane: George W Bush—That the Parliament regrets that George W Bush has secured another term as President of the United States of America; is concerned that anti-American feeling throughout the planet will now be increased as a result of his re-election, and recognises that the people of Iraq, Iran, Syria, Cuba and other countries named by President Bush as belonging to the "axis of evil" will be in a state of alarm. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Chris Ballance*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Mark Ruskell*

S2M-1954 Rosie Kane: George W Bush—That the Parliament regrets that George W Bush has secured another term as President of the United States of America; is concerned that anti-American feeling throughout the planet will now be increased as a result of his re-election, and recognises that the people of Iraq, Iran, Syria, Cuba and other countries named by President Bush as belonging to the "axis of evil" will be in a state of alarm. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie, Eleanor Scott, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Chris Ballance, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Mark Ruskell, Ms Sandra White*, Frances Curran*
